description.ko: 영원한 어둠 속에서 기묘한 생명체들이 매혹적인 생물 발광으로 빛을 밝히는, 고요하고 신비로운 심해의 세계를 탐험해보세요.
description.en: Explore the silent and mysterious depths of the ocean, where strange creatures illuminate the eternal darkness with mesmerizing bioluminescent light.

prompt: Hyper-realistic 8k cinematic shot of the deepest parts of the ocean, glowing bioluminescent jellyfish and strange deep-sea fish, hydrothermal vents, dark abyss background with faint particles, ethereal blue and purple lighting, intricate details of underwater rock formations, volumetric lighting, silent atmosphere.
